Rulings.Tengu:
● If a player controls a face-up Field Spell and they activate a Field Spell, this card is destroyed by its own effect.

● If a player controls a face-up Field Spell and their opponent activates a Field Spell, this card is not destroyed by its own effect.

PSCT.Base: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 "Red-Eyes Black Dragon" from your Deck. There can only be 1 "Malefic" monster on the field. Other monsters you control cannot declare an attack. If there is no face-up Field Spell on the field, destroy this card.
